subject: Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Beadle, who often drove a car called the Blue Max, was a three-time funny car world champion and the owner of a championship Nascar team.
snippet: Beadle, who often drove a car called the Blue Max, was a three-time funny car world champion and the owner of a championship Nascar team.
